title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6173.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6173.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

When used in this Part: (a) The term provider agency shall mean a
county, municipality, unit of local government, college or university, law
enforcement agency, or not-for-profit entity. (b) The term eligible driver shall mean the
driver of a livery vehicle. (c) The
term livery vehicle shall have the same meaning as set forth in section
837-h
(4)
of the Executive Law. (d) The term commissioner shall mean the
commissioner of the Division of Criminal Justice Services. (e) The term division shall mean the Division
of Criminal Justice Services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6173.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
